name: 青悦空气质量API
body:
FORMAT: 1A
HOST: http://api.epmap.org

# 青悦科技

国控实时空气质量查询

## 国控城市及监测点API [/api/v1/air/station_list]

### List [GET]

+ Response 200 (application/json)
    
        [
        {
            success: true,
            data: [
            {
                city: "寿光市",
                city_code: "0",
                station: "监测站",
                station_code: "1959A",
                lng: 118.746,
                lat: 36.881
            },
            {
                city: "寿光市",
                city_code: "0",
                station: "世纪学校",
                station_code: "1960A",
                lng: 118.78,
                lat: 36.864
            },
            ......
        ]

## 指定城市空气质量API [/api/v1/air/city?city={city_name}]

### List [GET]
+ Parameters
    + city_name (required, string, `上海市`) ... 城市名称
+ Response 200 (application/json)

            {
                success: true,
                data: {
                    city: "上海市",
                    city_code: "370783",
                    AQI: "120.0",
                    pollutions: "臭氧1小时",
                    level: "3",
                    SO2: "26.0",
                    NO2: "15.0",
                    CO: "0.8",
                    O3: "239.0",
                    PM2_5: "46.0",
                    PM10: "100.0",
                    longitude: "118.763",
                    latitude: "36.8725",
                    pubtime: "2016-08-24 13:00:00"
                }
            }

## 指定站点空气质量API [/api/v1/air/station?station_code={station_code}]

### List [GET]
+ Parameters
    + station_code (required, string, `1144A`) ... 监测站点编码
+ Response 200 (application/json)

            {
                success: true,
                data: {
                    city: "上海市",
                    city_code: "310000",
                    station: "徐汇上师大",
                    station_code: "1144A",
                    AQI: "105.0",
                    pollutions: "臭氧1小时",
                    level: "",
                    SO2: "10.0",
                    NO2: "30.0",
                    CO: "0.8",
                    O3: "210.0",
                    PM2_5: "20.0",
                    PM10: "41.0",
                    longitude: "121.412",
                    latitude: "31.1654",
                    pubtime: "2016-08-24 13:00:00"
                }
            }


## 查询最近监测站空气质量API [/api/v1/air?longitude={longitude}&latitude={latitude}]
### List [GET]
+ Parameters
    + longitude (required, float, `121.260372`) ... 经度
    + latitude (required, float, `31.09805`) ... 纬度
+ Response 200 (application/json)

            {
                success: true,
                data: {
                    city: "上海市",
                    city_code: "310000",
                    station: "徐汇上师大",
                    station_code: "1144A",
                    AQI: "105.0",
                    pollutions: "臭氧1小时",
                    level: "",
                    SO2: "10.0",
                    NO2: "30.0",
                    CO: "0.8",
                    O3: "210.0",
                    PM2_5: "20.0",
                    PM10: "41.0",
                    longitude: "121.412",
                    latitude: "31.1654",
                    pubtime: "2016-08-24 13:00:00"
                }
            }

# 调用API
青悦空气质量API采用阿里云API Gateway服务搭建，API调用方式详见http://docs-aliyun.cn-hangzhou.oss.aliyun-inc.com/pdf/apigateway-c_user-guide-cn-zh-2016-08-25.pdf
## 示例sdk
[https://github.com/aliyun/api-gateway-demo-sign-python](https://github.com/aliyun/api-gateway-demo-sign-python)

## 示例代码
```
from com.aliyun.api.gateway.sdk import client
from com.aliyun.api.gateway.sdk.http import request
from com.aliyun.api.gateway.sdk.common import constant

host = "http://api.epmap.org"
url = "/api/v1/air?longitude=121.260372&latitude=31.09805"

req = request.Request(host=host, url=url, method="GET", time_out=30000)
req.set_content_type(constant.CONTENT_TYPE_JSON)

#cli = client.DefaultClient(app_key="23436472", app_secret="049a263c4fcc7f9cad844d1072e55e57")

cli = client.DefaultClient(app_key="keysecret2", app_secret="secretsecret2")

print cli.execute(req)
```
